name: Satisgame
description:
A satisfying game for ultimate relaxation.
Experience magical stress relief and comfort,
Potentially easing symptoms of OCD.
The game features five categories:
Tidying, jigsaw puzzles, anti-stress, puzzles, and mini-games.
Wow~ It's truly a satisfying experience!
(More games are being updated...)
developers: 无锡地鼠洞网络科技有限公司
